# JWSTransaction

**Type**

Transaction information signed by the App Store, in JSON Web Signature (JWS) Compact Serialization format.

## Declaration

```swift
string JWSTransaction
```

### Description

This `JWSTransaction` object is identical to the one used in the App Store Server API and by App Store Server Notifications. For details, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/JWSTransaction].

## Signed transaction information

- **JWSRenewalInfo**: Subscription renewal information signed by the App Store, in JSON Web Signature (JWS) format.
